titleStmt.title: For the King and Council, these
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Two letters to King Charles, the first signed and dated: G.F. (George Fox) and J.S. (John Stubbs) London, 16 day, 11 month 1660; the second signed Henry Fell. For authority for joint authorship of first letter, cf. Brit. mus. cat.--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
